title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; simple interface for chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps ollama with ergonomic commands and fzf model picker.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that uses local Ollama models for AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack component to use Ollama models in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings and tool support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, NVIDIA runtime and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB in a single script.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images and moderates using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for private and channel-based conversations.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that can switch backend to Ollama via REST plugin for local LLM chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local AI autocomplete, summarization and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and module for declarative OS configuration.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST API.
